item.title: Blogging again
item.description: I’ve been wrestling with the idea of moving to a blogdown site rather than having a handful of static pages squatting in a github page. After hemming and hawwing about it, I’ve finally set up a hugo blog, found a nice theme and a way of pushing the changes up. Disqus comments aren’t working yet but I’m figuring out how to get that, so that it’s actually possible to engage in a discussion.
